QuestData.Title: The Durnholde Challenge: D-1000
QuestData.Description: Imprisoned in the old Durnholde Keep arena is a being comprised of pure mercury. The Forsaken have dubbed it the D-1000. Kill the D-1000 and claim your prize!
QuestData.RewardText: This is the first time anyone has actually completed the challenge. You truly are a powerful $c, $n. As promised, choose your reward.
